Chris Smalling Dapat Pesan dari Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, Apa Isinya?
01 Nov 2019, 06:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chris Smalling tidak memperkuat Manchester United pada musim ini. Namun itu bukan berarti dirinya putus hubungan dengan sang pelatih, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Pemain berumur 29 tahun itu memutuskan angkat kaki dari Old Trafford pada bursa transfer musim panas kemarin. Kemudian, ia hengkang ke AS Roma dengan status pinjaman selama satu tahun penuh.
Alasan kepindahannya cukup sederhana. Smalling diyakini bakalan kesulitan untuk mendapatkan menit bermain yang banyak bersama Manchester United musim ini. Sebab, klub raksasa Inggris itu baru saja kedatangan Harry Maguire dari Leicester City.
Manchester United harus merogoh kocek sebesar 80 juta pounds untuk membawa Maguire ke Old Trafford. Mengingat banyaknya uang yang dikeluarkan klub, maka sudah hampir mustahil jika Maguire duduk di bangku cadangan.

Chris Smalling Got a Message from Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, What's in it?
Nov 01 2019, 06:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chris Smalling has not played for Manchester United this season. But that does not mean he broke up with the coach, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
The 29-year-old player decided to leave from Old Trafford in the transfer market last summer. Then, he moved to AS Roma on loan for one full year.
The reason for the move is quite simple. Smalling is believed to be struggling to get a lot of minutes playing with Manchester United this season. Because, the English giant club has just the arrival of Harry Maguire from Leicester City.
Manchester United have to spend 80 million pounds to bring Maguire to Old Trafford. Given the amount of money spent by the club, it is almost impossible if Maguire sat on the bench.
